scenes.title: The Edge of the Forest
scenes.text:
You stand at the edge of an ancient forest. The air shimmers with unstable energy—the Rift is active. Multiple realities are bleeding into each other.

A path leads deeper into the woods, where strange lights flicker between the trees.

choices.flavorText: Something feels wrong about those lights...

votingImpact.unanimousBonus: Extra scene detail, stronger genre shift
votingImpact.splitVote: Fractured outcome - both investigation and hesitation happen

Scan the area with your device

scenes.title: Shadows and Light
scenes.text: You creep toward the lights, every shadow seeming to reach for you. The forest holds its breath. As you get closer, the lights resolve into something impossible—floating orbs of pure darkness surrounded by halos of sickly green luminescence.

riftEvent.description: RIFT EVENT - Romance genre forces its way in!
riftEvent.modifiedText:
You creep toward the lights, every shadow seeming to reach for you. The forest holds its breath.

**RIFT EVENT!** A surge of romantic energy floods the scene!

The shadows transform into flower petals, swirling around you. A figure emerges from the light—beautiful, ethereal, and somehow familiar. Their eyes meet yours, and reality bends around this moment.

scenes.title: Beautiful and Terrible
scenes.text:
"You do," they whisper, and their voice is both a lullaby and a dirge. "We've met in a thousand timelines, loved and lost across infinite realities."

Their hand reaches for yours. In the darkness, you see flashes: moments of tenderness and tragedy, passion and pain, all bleeding together.

This is what genre contamination creates—romance that hurts, horror that attracts.

endings.title: Hearts Entwined
endings.text:
Connection sparks between you. Time seems to slow. The Rift stabilizes around romantic energy, reality bending to create the perfect moment.

But beneath the surface, you sense something darker waiting...
endings.nextEpisodeHook: The bond you've formed is strong, but the Rift has plans of its own...

endings.title: The Dark Woods
endings.text:
Your instincts were right. The figure's smile twists into something wrong. The petals turn to ash. The forest whispers secrets that should never be known.

The Rift pulses with dark energy.
endings.nextEpisodeHook: You escaped the forest, but something followed you home...

endings.title: Quantum Revelation
endings.text:
Your readings reveal the truth: this forest is a convergence point for parallel realities. You've found the Rift's epicenter.

With this knowledge, you could control which reality dominates—or destroy them all.
endings.nextEpisodeHook: Knowledge is power, but some truths are dangerous to know...

endings.title: Reality Fractures
endings.text:
Too many genres fought for control. The Rift couldn't stabilize. Reality itself begins to crack.

You're standing in three timelines at once. This shouldn't be possible, but here you are—a living paradox.
endings.nextEpisodeHook: You've broken the rules of reality. Now you must face the consequences...
